text:
"Pokémon Sword and Shield" are the first set of games in the eighth generation of the "Pokémon" series. They released on the Nintendo Switch on November 15, 2019. This is the first Pokémon game to have DLC, being "The Isle Of Armor" (released June 17, 2020) and "The Crown Tundra" (released October 22, 2020)
Gameplay.
Gyms return from previous entries and the combat is the same with new Dynamaxing, which makes the Pokémon larger.
